Title: Senior ASIC Engineer - Hardware
Description:
Senior ASIC Engineer, Verification
NVIDIA is seeking passionate, highly motivated, and creative senior ASIC verification engineers to be part of its Graphics team working on the design of state of the art memory subsystem components used in their industry-leading Graphics Processors and Tegra SOCs. This position offers the opportunity to have real impact in a dynamic, technology-focused company impacting product lines ranging from consumer graphics to self-driving cars and the growing field of artificial intelligence. We have created a team of exceptional people stretching around the globe, whose mission is to push the frontiers of what is possible today and define the platform for the future of computing.
In this position, you will be expected to plan and implement IP/Cluster/SOC functional verification of designs that constitute our Graphics Processors and Tegra SOCs. You would work on creating regression plans for code as well as functional coverage closure. You would perform pre-silicon validation activities such as XPROP simulations and GLS.
What you’ll be doing:
Own ASIC verification of IP/Cluster for complicated designs in RTL.
Work with HW architects and designers to make the right implementation choices.
Interact with the Performance verification teams to augment verification through dynamic simulations and/or Formal verification techniques.
You will work with the specifications and ensure functional and code coverage of all the RTL which you will verify.
Work with and enable FPGA and S/W teams to ensure that S/W is tested.
You will be involved with post-silicon verification and debug
What we need to see:
BS / MS with 2+ years of design experience
Experience in ASIC verification of complex design units for at least one or two projects
Exposure to design and verification tools (VCS or equivalent simulation tools, debug tools like Debussy, GDB)
Exposure to System Verilog and UVM based methodology for ASIC verification is highly desired.
Ways to stand out from the crowd:
Knowledge of Memory controllers or prior experience with verification of IP/clusters involving access to Memory.
Working knowledge of DRAM specifications like HBM and LPDDRx memory standards.
Good debugging and problem solving skills
Scripting knowledge (Python/Perl/shell)
Good interpersonal skills and ability & desire to work as a part of a team
NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers. We have some of the most brilliant and talented people in the world working for us. If you are creative, autonomous and love a challenge, we want to hear from you. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Title: Software Engineer, IoS Mobile Apps
Description:
Minimum qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience.
5 years of relevant work experience.
Experience in software development using one or more general purpose programming languages.
Experience working with IoS specific mobile applications from ground up.

Preferred qualifications:
PhD degree in Engineering, Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience with Internet of Things, Cloud Infrastructure, Device and Network management
Ability to share knowledge via formal mentoring, reviewing code, reviewing design documents, giving technical talks, teaching classes, or as a consultant on projects.
Ability and interest to learn other coding languages as needed.
About the job
Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
As a Software Engineer for IoS Mobile Apps, you will develop iOS applications, design and implement full stack app foundation features as well as core app features from ground-up that enable devices to provide delightful user experiences.
Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices & Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user's interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices & Services team is making people's lives better through technology.
Responsibilities
Work on IoS mobile applications, cloud services and tools.
Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve IoS mobile application and related software.
Manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables.
Build products that can scale it for users around the world.
At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.

Title: Senior Agile Software Engineer
Description:
Company Overview / PrÃ©sentation de lâentreprise::
Nuance is the pioneer and leader in conversational artificial intelligence (AI) innovations that bring intelligence to everyday work and life. We deliver solutions that understand, analyze, and respond to people, amplifying human intelligence to increase productivity and improve security. With decades of both domain and AI expertise, we work with thousands of organizations across a wide range of industries.

Join our team! At Nuance, we are constantly reinventing how people connect with technology and with each other. Our AI-powered solutions empower organizations to transform “business as usual.” For decades, the world’s leading financial, healthcare, telecommunications, retailers, and government organizations have trusted Nuance to bring them award-winning solutions that deliver more meaningful outcomes and empower a smarter, more connected world. From clinical speech recognition technologies that free physicians to spend more time caring for patients to real-time intelligence that powers billions of customer interactions, we’re deeply committed to helping organizations push the boundaries of what’s possible.
Job Summary / Sommaire du poste: :
Summary:
The Agile Software Engineer will contribute to development of Nuance Dragon Medical One. The position holder will work as part of an agile development team on development activities for Dragon Medical One with an exciting mixture of technologies.
Dragon Medical One is a cloud-based, secure speech recognition solution for the healthcare market, enabling healthcare providers to efficiently document using their voice. The position holder is expected to actively contribute in all areas of software development – requirements engineering, architecture, design, implementation, software testing and software testing automation – working in a highly collaborative and global environment.

Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.

Good with peer design and code reviews.

Preferred Skills:

Experience with product development for the Microsoft Azure platform.
Experience with Git.
Experience with JIRA, Confluence, Bamboo and other Atlassian tools.
Experience with development of Healthcare Information technology applications.

Experience with professional product development in combination with speech recognition technologies and/or artificial intelligence.

Additional Information / Informations additionnelles::
Nuance offers a compelling and rewarding work environment. We offer market competitive salaries, bonus, equity, benefits, meaningful growth and development opportunities and a casual yet technically challenging work environment. Join our dynamic, entrepreneurial team and become part of our continuing success.

Title: Senior Technology Specialist Application (AWS Sr. Developer/...
Description:
At Telstra, we have a clear purpose: to build a connected future so everyone can thrive. We believe it’s people who give purpose to our technology. So we are committed to staying close to our customers and providing them the best experience. And delivering the best technology.
This is where YOU come in, by playing your part in helping our customers connect: faster, better and smarter.
Who we are?
Telstra is Australia's leading telecommunications and technology company with a rich heritage that’s been built over 100 years. From our humble beginnings in the Postmaster General’s Office to the global business we are today our people have been at the forefront of technology innovation. More recently, we have the largest Internet of Things network in Australia and are leading the way in 5G. And this is just the beginning of what we’re hoping to achieve together.
We offer a full range of services and compete in all telecommunications markets throughout Australia and are the most well-known brand in technology and communications industry.
We have operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’ve opened an Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore, and have a presence in Pune and Hyderabad. In India, we’ve set out to build a platform for innovative delivery and engagement that will strengthen our position as an industry leader. We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
About the role:
Telstra Bangalore is looking out for Senior Software Engineer – AWS DevOps Specialist, as a senior technical expert in the team, the role:
Works with the capability Feature Team Lead and other team members to craft solutions that meet the strategic goals of the capability.
Create technical components as designed by the solution engineer. However, applies intelligence, and works with the solution engineer to change designs if there is a better solution. May take on solution engineering role as required
Assists other team members in creation of technical components
To be successful in the role, you’ll.
8+ years’ experience with at least one of: JAVA, Typescript, ES5+, Python, Bash
Experience in delivery of technical components of large complex IT projects
Experience with Agile delivery methodologies and helping teams explore, adopt and optimize Agile/Lean processes, principles and practices
Deep technical knowledge of microservices, web development frameworks and APIs.
Has contributed to developing and maintaining CI/CD tooling within a project or team
Deep technical knowledge of CloudFormation and/or Terraform
Deep domain knowledge of an O2A Capability domain. (added advantage)
At least one AWS Certification at Professional level, or can demonstrate proficiency with AWS services to a similar level
What can we offer you?
Dynamic, innovative and knowledgeable, our people are the brains behind amazing achievements such as keeping on top of the latest technology or masterminding the store of the future. And because they share the same vision, they take the time to pass on their knowledge, mentor you, and guide you in your career path.

Here you’ll have the opportunity to work with some of the best minds in the industry, people who are passionate about Telstra and technology, and who work together to achieve great things.
Not only will you be rewarded with a competitive salary package, but there are a range of lifestyle products and services that you can access, including options to purchase additional leave, volunteer leave and the list goes on. We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit our Telstra Careers Website: tel.st/allrolesflex
Sounds like you?

A career with us will give you a platform to shape tomorrow through technology. For you, that means helping us to push the boundaries of what’s possible today, and in the future. It also gives you the opportunity to empower millions helping businesses grow, evolve and reach their potential.

At Telstra, you can thrive, your way. We foster new ideas, we embrace different ways of working and thinking, and we believe an inclusive and diverse team will lead us to innovate for the future.

Title: AI ML BDM Startup Ecosystem
Description:
Some relevant technical knowledge is helpful in areas such as: database systems, core distributed computing concepts, fundamentals of cloud computing and virtualization, storage systems, etc.10+ years of business development, strategic partnerships, and/or product management experience in the AI and/or advanced-technology arena
10+ years of senior business development, executive leadership, startup operating/leadership, or technical marketing/ sales experience.
Strong business and financial acumen.
Strong analytical, verbal/written communications skills, and demonstrated ability to turn detailed data and market analysis into useful strategic insight in order to drive customer adoption and make appropriate strategic recommendations to the business.
Experience with, and detailed knowledge of machine learning technologies and applications.
Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external organizations
Degree required

Are you energized by the potential for Artificial Intelligence, Machine and Deep Learning applications? Are you passionate about working with entrepreneurs, startups, accelerators, incubators and venture capital firms? We are seeking an expert in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) to define, build and deploy our strategy for ensuring broad adoption of the AWS machine learning platform amongst the top Indian startups. With Amazon Artificial Intelligence (Amazon AI), which leverages Amazon’s deep investments in AI over the last 20 years, Amazon Wed Services (“AWS”), the cloud product line of Amazon, is focused on bringing that knowledge and capability to customers in India to help them solve complex business challenges through three layers of the cloud-based AI stack – Frameworks and Infrastructure with tools like Apache MXNet and TensorFlow, API driven services to quickly add intelligence to applications, and Machine Learning platforms. As a result, we see more and more amazing AI work being done on AWS cloud across education, healthcare, media & entertainment, travel and almost every industry vertical.

Amazon internet Services Private Limited (AISPL), the local reseller of AWS Services in India is looking for a Business Development Manager for Artificial Intelligence. You will be someone who is deeply excited about this space, passionate about helping customers understand the value proposition of AWS AI services and how AI can make a big difference to fast growing start-ups. As the business development manager for AI within AISPL, you will work closely with the AISPL business development teams, as well as solution architect, partner and marketing teams to promote and provide guidance on the value proposition of the AWS ML platform to startups, venture capital and angel investors, accelerators and incubators in India.

You will be responsible for building strategic programs and mechanisms for AISPL for identifying and engaging with target startups, developing and managing relationships with key venture capital investors, startup organizations and startups in India, and operating as an AI/ML subject matter expert in its pursuit of getting and keeping the best startups in India on AISPL account.

The ideal candidate will possess a business and machine learning/data analytics background, and a foundation of having directly driven customer engagement and interactions at the highest levels of startups and their backers (VCs, accelerators, incubators). The candidate will have the technical depth and business experience to easily communicate the benefits of ML services, platforms and frameworks in the AWS cloud to IT architects, engineering teams, C-level executives and venture capitalists. The ideal candidate will have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and long-term about the needs of startups in India.

Continuously assessing and analyzing the market landscape and opportunity for engaging with AISPL’s customers in India for AWS ML services.
Developing a mechanism for continuous identification and prioritization of startups in India to target for AWS ML platform adoption, and developing and owning metrics and goals relating to startup adoption of the AWS ML platform for AISPL’s customers in India.
Conceiving, developing and launching scalable campaigns, initiatives, programs and mechanisms for AISPL for engaging with, educating and guiding startups in India on how to build their business utilizing the AWS ML platform.
Developing and managing relationships with key startup influencers within the AI/ML ecosystem, including venture capital and angel investors, accelerators, incubators and other industry organizations and
Producing AWS AI/ML thought leadership and educational events for the startup ecosystem in India.
Discovering, capturing and reporting learnings from the field about customer to AISPL’s management on challenges and opportunities as they relate to the use of AWS ML platform.
Collaborating with multiple functional teams to better serve the AI/ML needs of AISPL’s startup customers in India, and engaging in senior level customer meetings to discuss customer business challenges and explore how the AWS ML platform can help address those challenges for AISPL’s customers.
Informing, influencing and contributing to the work of other functional teams in AISPL including marketing, business development, compliance, security, and product teams around AWS ML services.
Serving as an evangelist and subject matter expert for the AWS ML platform within AISPL and externally.
Preparing and giving business reviews to the AISPL’s senior management team regarding progress and metrics to growing startup adoption of the AWS ML platform.

Business-level experience with machine learning platforms
Startup founder/CXO experience and / or VC investment experience
Implementation experience with MXNet, TensorFlow, Theano, Caffe, or other deep learning frameworks
Implementation experience with advanced analytics, including machine learning, and predictive modelling
Familiarity with AWS Services
Experience with AWS AI services
MBA or equivalent executive level experience

Title: Business Analyst - Sales Engineer
Description:
Role: SBA/BA : Sales Engineer(SE)
Experience Level: 2 to 7 Years
Work location: Mumbai & Bangalore

What you’ll do:

As part of the core sales team of Quantiphi, the Sales Engineer will be responsible for execution of end-to-end sales process in a B2B environment. Your responsibilities will include:
Take ownership for enhancing the customer experience, assisting customers by utilizing consultative selling practices and guidelines to identify their needs and provide appropriate solutions
Manage communication & relationship with customers, prospects and partners and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction
• Prepare and explain products, solutions or services to a variety of audiences • Develop sales collaterals(Business and technical presentations, Point of views, solution approaches etc.,)
Engage & drive end-to-end pre-sales activities for the company in Data Science & Applied AI domain.
Work closely with cross functional teams (Solution Architects, Engineering team and other sales support teams) towards meeting customer requirements
Apply the right analysis frameworks and effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop creative solutions to complex business problems
Bring thought leadership to conversations with customers, prospects and partners to methodically define business problems, capture requirements, scope the solution and support the closure of the deal
Researching and identifying sales opportunity, generating leads, target identification and classification
Data reporting to management and gathering market intelligence
Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as required
What you’ll need to succeed:

Apart from being Driven, Energetic and Ambitious, you’ll need the following:
Master’s or Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Economics or Engineering
Excellent communication (written & verbal), including the ability to clearly articulate complex ideas. (Mandatory)
Understanding of sales cycle and sales techniques
Experience of B2B sales, customer communication and relationship management is preferable
Logical ability to understand client's needs and present solutions
Data driven mindset. Your plans and actions are backed by not just gut feeling but also customer/industry/market research
Attention to detail and sharp acumen to propagate your views in an effective manner
Knowledge and willingness to learn and apply emerging trends in business, research, data science, Machine learning, Artificial Intelligence and Cloud Technologies
Excellent aptitude in business analysis and awareness of quantitative analysis techniques.

Title: Principal Engineer
Description:
Aspect employs a team of passionate individuals who are changing the face of customer engagement. Over our 40-year history we have empowered employees by creating an inspired community that values customer obsession, unlocked communications and relentless innovation. Our ability to think big has enabled us to continually evolve and lead the market, and to stay on the forefront with exciting technologies including cloud, mobile and artificial intelligence.

Job Description
GENERAL SCOPE & SUMMARY
With direct management and mentoring of a Senior Engineer or higher, an Associate Engineer contributes as a team member for development, unit testing, and defect resolution of a specific area of a product component or test tool component. The Associate Engineer leverages computer programming languages and other specific technologies required to develop and maintain the component at a novice level.
PRIMARY ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES
Analyzes, programs, debugs, and does ongoing modification to selected areas of a software component, under the mentorship of more senior staff.
Code may be used in commercial end-user applications, prototypes, or in test tools or other supporting programs.
Using the required programming languages and other technologies, writes code, completes programming, and performs testing and debugging of application components.
Completes internal documentation and procedures for ongoing maintenance of the code and for the use of the code by other developers.
May interact with internal cross-functional members to better understand system requirements and/or necessary modifications.
Develops and/or executes implementation according to the project plans and priorities provided by more senior staff.
May participate in development in any of a range of product areas such as thin client, rich client, server, installation, communication layers, and so forth.
Qualifications
Required Skills:
Experience level - 4+ years
Strong proficiency in C++ 14 Standards
Design and Implementation experience using Data structures, Design Patterns, STL
Good knowledge of Multi-threading, Socket Programming
Identify Performance Bottlenecks and derive solution to fix problems.
Strong debugging skills
Development environment in Windows or Linux

Desired Skills
Experience in Telephony Services
Experience in Source Control & CI - Clear Case, Git repository.
AWS Cloud Technologies
Azure Cloud Technologies
LI-SS1
Aspect is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer with a strong commitment to diversity. In that spirit, we are particularly interested in receiving applications from a broad spectrum of people, including women, minorities, individuals with disabilities, veterans or any other legally protected group.

Title: Software Engineer, Sr.
Description:
A bit about Epsilon

We are the global leader in creating meaningful connections between people and brands. We work with 15 of the top 20 global brands and 8 of the top 10 Fortune 500 companies. How did we get this far? It is because of our team of thinkers and doers who together are the perfect blend of data, technology and creativity. They are fearless go-getters and creative innovators who have passion, determination and our support to make their ideas come to life.
To know more about us, please visit https://india.epsilon.com and follow us on Facebook, Twitter,LinkedIn, and Instagram.

Who we are looking for
At Epsilon, we deliver excellence and create connections that last a lifetime. Our digital marketing arm, Conversant, is now growing and we are on the lookout for talented individuals who believe that every interaction counts - and want to make an impact on the future of our clients’ businesses.
So, are you someone who wants to work on the cutting edge of new-generation UI technology? Does the thought of working with Data Warehouse, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence excite you? Then you could be exactly who we’re looking for.
Apply today and be part of a dynamic, enthusiastic and passionate team who want nothing more but to make a lasting impact on the lives of consumers. You will also get the opportunity to see your ideas come to life on almost every consumer device across the US.

What you’ll do

You will design and code solutions on and off database for ensuring application access to enable data driven decision making for the company’s multi-faceted ad serving operations.
Working closely with Engineering resources across the globe to ensure enterprise data warehouse solutions and assets are actionable, accessible and evolving in lockstep with the needs of the ever-changing business model.
Should be able to develop test cases and validation methodology to demonstrate work product meets required needs
Ideal candidate can lead in the areas of: solution design, code development, quality assurance, data modeling, business intelligence, cross team communication, project management, and application maintenance.

What you’ll need

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent degree is required.
6+ years of business analysis experience around database marketing technologies and data management, and technical understanding in these areas.
Strong experience in SQL
Experience with PostgreSQL, pgplsql and python
Strong understanding of Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity solutions
Experience with scheduling applications with complex interdependencies
Good experience in working with geographically and culturally diverse teams
Familiarity with complex data lake environments that span OLTP, MPP and Hadoop platforms
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to handle complex products
Excellent Analytical and problem solving skills
Ability to diagnose and troubleshoot problems quickly

Primary Location: IND - India-4009 - Karnataka-54353 - Bangalore-P6-India-Bangalore Hub-2
Work Locations: P6-India-Bangalore Hub-2 560045
Job: Technology
Organization: Epsilon
Schedule: Regular
Job Type: Full-time
Job Posting: Jan 16, 2020, 4:07:50 AM
Division: Epsilon India
RI: RM

Title: Senior Data & Applied Scientist
Description:
Who we are
We are the Microsoft Search and Intelligence team, the engine that powers Office 365 and many other critical products within Microsoft Cloud. Office 365 is the largest collaboration service in the world with 100s of millions of consumer/enterprise mailboxes, documents and conversations, it represents the world’s largest platform of human collaboration for personal, business and educational use. We are a massively distributed cloud service with O(exabyte) data handled by O(300K) servers in O(300) data-centers around the entire globe. By incorporating machine learning techniques and data analytics into the services we deliver, we enable highly personalized, self-learning experiences and suggestions that make each user be more productive every time they use the service.

As part of this team, we have a pretty simple goal – to assist users in being more efficient: we want to build AI/ML scenarios and platform with cutting edge tech that encompasses data collection, feature engineering, model training, extensive experimentation, deploying, productization, and monitoring of machine learning models involving text, image, audio/video. Our scenarios require use of the latest machine learning, QnA, deep learning, NLU and NLP to improve and automate business process and generate knowledge and insight.

Do you like to work on the hardest problems in computing with the biggest user impact?
We are looking for an Applied Scientist to work on the AI/ML initiatives for scenarios that have a tremendous impact on the Office 365 business. The candidate should be knowledgeable in AI techniques, with a focus on problem-solving, rather than a particular method or tool kit. The candidate should be open to exploring various cutting-edge AI technologies and applying them on large scale data. The candidate has demonstrated experience helping build and ship machine-learning models to customers based on real-world scenarios.
Responsibilities
Work with a team of applied scientists, data scientists and engineers that are building AI/ML scenarios in Office 365.
Be customer-focused with a commitment to high quality end to end services through livesite and quality-first culture
Work independently and collaboratively with other research and product teams across Microsoft to build end-to-end intelligent experiences involving machine reading comprehension, enterprise knowledge base and knowledge graph systems, semantic experiences, etc.
Communicate complex topic to non-technical audiences
Understand the implications of complex business, legal, and regulatory issues on technology and technical deliverables.
Collaborate inside and outside the team, and across remote development locations
Have fun and learn new things
Qualifications
A PhD, in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, Statistics or related subjects, or candidates with exceptional ML skills with a Master's degree
Understanding of state-of-the-art deep learning techniques, evidenced by a publication record in relevant conferences (e.g., NeurIPS, ICLR, ICML, ACL, EMNLP, …) or product development.
Hands-on experience with current frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, NLTK, CNTK, PyTorch, or DyNet)
Practical experience and understanding in all the areas of the machine learning model life cycle
Solid coding skills in any OOP language
Strong theory/algorithmic background and good understanding on how to apply advanced knowledge to solve real problems
Prior experience on large scale data mining or internet-scale applications, will be a plus.

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.

#STCIJobs

Title: Senior Software Engineer - Platform
Description:
About Us
--------

Blueshift ( http://blueshift.com/ ) is a venture-funded startup headquartered in San Francisco. Our AI-Powered marketing platform empowers cutting edge B2C brands to drive 1:1 marketing on every channel. With Blueshift, marketers are in full control of automating various forms of personalized messaging across every engagement channel.

Blueshift is trusted by leading digital brands like Udacity, LendingTree, BBC, and Paypal to automate their customer engagement marketing and recognized by Gartner as a "Cool Vendor for AI in Marketing".

Blueshift is founded by repeat entrepreneurs who previously built Mertado.com (acquired by Groupon to become Groupon Goods), and were part of the early team behind Kosmix (acquired by Walmart to become @WalmartLabs). We are backed by top-tier VCs including Nexus Venture Partners, Storm Ventures, Luma Partners, and SoftBank Venture Asia.

Blueshift has now started staffing a new development center in Pune, India. As part of Blueshift, you will get to work on cutting-edge technologies including machine learning, artificial intelligence, big data, and large-scale distributed data systems. This is an exciting opportunity for motivated individuals to build a great career.

Senior Software Engineer - Platform
----------------------------------------

As a senior engineer focusing on Blueshift's campaign execution engine, you will be working on scaling the existing infrastructure to handle billions of messages. In addition, you will be building and maintaining new services to support campaign features. You will be evaluating and introducing new technology and tools to help achieve the desired scale and performance.

Responsibilities
----------------

Build & maintain large scale and low latency distributed systems scaling to billions of actions
Tune service parameters to maximize performance
Evaluate and introduce new technologies and tools
Assess and fix bottlenecks in our current infrastructure
Analyze production performance and respond to problems with innovative solutions
Requirements
------------

7+ years working experience as an application developer or backend engineer
Experience working with real-time, distributed systems
Experience working with messaging queues or similar systems
Working knowledge of various data-stores such as SQL, Cassandra, ElasticSearch, & Redis
Experience with Ruby/Rails, Elixir, or Golang will be a definite plus
Proven record of successfully scaling up services
Solid understanding of Computer Science concepts including data structures and concurrency
Capability to provide attention to minute details
Curiosity and willingness to assess and learn new technologies
Bachelors/Masters/PhD in Computer Science or related fields
Perks and Benefits
------------------

Opportunity to be part of the early team in India
Competitive salary
Stock option grants
Hospitalization and term insurance
Daily catered breakfast, lunch, and snacks along with well-stocked pantry

Title: Compliance Manager
Description:
Who We Are:
Ocrolus is a fintech infrastructure company that transforms documents into actionable data with over 99% accuracy. Powered by Artificial Intelligence and a unique human-in-the-loop data validation process, Ocrolus plugs directly into customer workflows via API, eliminating the need for manual data work. The solution includes built-in fraud detection and analytics, enabling customers to make smarter and faster business decisions with unprecedented precision.

Use-cases include loan underwriting, account openings, invoice processing, and other document-intensive processes. Ocrolus has raised over $30 million in venture capital, backed by Oak HC/FT, FinTech Collective, Bullpen Capital, and QED Investors, among others.

We’re looking for a Compliance Manager to assist in building out a governance and control framework for Ocrolus operations in India. We are looking for a self-starter who will suggest and drive implementation of best practice solutions customized for Ocrolus fast-paced environment to ensure compliance with customer and regulatory requirements.

Responsibilities
Implement required and best practice controls at the operations centers to address Ocrolus compliance requirements (including standards related to information security, people security, data privacy, contractual requirements)
Research and propose best practice solutions for the specific nature of Ocrolus operations
Identify and implement improvement and efficiency opportunities
Design and implement a compliance monitoring program to ensure all centers continue to comply with internal and external requirements
Conduct regular onsite visits at Ocrolus operations centers
Requirements:
Experience in implementing and testing controls, preferably at a large operations facility
Internal and/or external audit, or compliance monitoring experience, preferably working for a large recognized public accounting or financial services company
Practical experience communicating with various stakeholders effectively across the organization
Ability to work in a remote environment with teams in India and in the United States
Working knowledge of information security related best practices and standards such as ISO 2700x, SOC 2 requirements
Experience documenting policies and procedures
Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar compliance or audit role
Ability to travel to our centers in Noida (Uttar Pradesh) and Jaipur (Rajasthan) Occasional international travel may be required as well
Excellent verbal and writing skills (in English)

We’re a young and rapidly growing FinTech company - if you have ever wanted to jump on a rocket ship as it’s taking off, now is your chance!

Title: Physical Design Manager
Description:
Ampere is designing the future of hyperscale cloud and edge computing with its 64-bit Arm server processor architecture. Born in and built for the cloud with a modern architecture, Ampere gives customers the freedom to accelerate the delivery of the most memory-intensive applications such as artificial intelligence, big data, machine learning and databases in the cloud. The Ampere eMAG family of products delivers the highest memory throughput and lowest TCO tailored for the emerging growth of cloud computing and next-generation data centers.
Our Story
Like the scientist behind its name, Ampere employees are innovators. We understand the needs of cloud computing and different software requirements. We are inventing what comes next and looking at everything from the structure of memory and how efficient the system is, to considerations on speed, cost of electricity and ability to cool. Power, size, weight and cost are driving the technology requirements and the innovation to come.
Our world class team of engineers, with depth and expertise in the cloud and semiconductor industries, is not only focused on the development of new semiconductor designs but also building out the first software ecosystem for Arm®-based server processors. Through the Ampere approach to the cloud and edge, we give our customers the freedom to challenge the status quo and accelerate next-generation data centers for the most memory-intensive applications. Given the challenge we have outlined, we are building a culture of entrepreneurs that ensure customers come first, proactively approaching industry challenges in the areas of security, power and performance, delivering results that matter most.
Job Description:
Physical design and implementation of high-speed components of the processor complex. Participating in the efforts of establishing physical design methodologies, flow automation, RTL synthesis, chip and block floorplan, power/clock distribution, P&R, timing closure, EM/IR analysis, LVS/DRC for tapeout in a very vertical oriented design team.

Responsibilities:
Responsibilities will include Synthesis, P&R, IR/EM, STA, Physical Verification flow development/automation, physical verification, IR/EM analysis, design reviews, IP-characterization, Spice simulation based analysis etc
Work with multiple sites in a team environment particularly with offices in the US.
Work with Physical-design/Physical-design-verification engineers to fix flow related issues and make improvements to the flow as needed.
Requirements:
BS/MS in EE or equivalent required with 12+ years of experience in physical design
Previous experience in taping out designs in 7nm/16nm technology nodes.
SDC implementation and validation, Synthesis flows and methodology.
Strong hands-on experience in floor planning, clock tree synthesis, timing closure, signal integrity, IR drop analysis, ECO implementation, and physical design
Experience in low-power design, custom placement and implementation of high-speed (>2 GHz) datapaths and clocks.
Strong hands-on physical verification (Caliber LVS/DRC). Work with LEF/GDS issue with IP, library and PDK.
Knowledge of all aspects of chip development process with proficiency in backend design tools and methodologies.
Coding in scripting languages such as Perl, Tcl, UNIX shell, Makefiles, etc.
Experience in interfacing with logic designers and solving complex timing paths.
Experience in industry standard physical design and analysis tools.
Experience in managing a team of engineers to execute the various physical design tasks.
Self-driven individual and a good team player.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
We are looking for a Machine Learning (ML) Engineer to help us create artificial intelligence products. Machine Learning Engineer responsibilities include creating machine learning models and retraining systems. To do this job successfully, you need exceptional skills in statistics and programming. If you also have knowledge of data science and software engineering, we'd like to meet you. Your ultimate goal will be to shape and build efficient self-learning applications.

Responsibilities:
Designing and developing machine learning and deep learning systems.
Running machine learning tests and experiments.
Implementing appropriate ML algorithms.
Study and transform data science prototypes.
Design machine learning systems.
Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools.
Develop machine learning applications according to requirements.
Select appropriate datasets and data representation methods.
Run machine learning tests and experiments.
Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results.
Train and retrain systems when necessary.
Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks.
Keep abreast of developments in the field.
Requirements:
Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role.
Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture.
Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms.
Ability to write robust code in Python, Java and R.
Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn).
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to work in a team.
Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills.
BSc in Computer Science, Mathematics or similar field; Master's degree is a plus.

Title: Firmware Validation Engineer
Description:
Job Description
Datacenter Engineering Group (DEA) is looking for talents for Senior Validation Lead engineer to secure the SW quality by continuous integration. In this position, you will be responsible for driving the validation of software and hardware on Intel server products primarily on Artificial Intelligence solution to secure the quality of SW release. Your responsibilities will include but not be limited to:
Developing and maintaining Intel platform validation process and methodologies
Developing and maintaining platform validation test plan and BKMs
Defining evaluation scope and coverage to meet the quality goal of Intel server product.
Managing ODC or CW on the validation schedule and driving flawless execution in high quality standard.
Drive sightings for closure by proactive physical work and/or coordination with relevant stakeholders on defect duplication and investigation.
Leading complex issue debugging and support critical quality excursion.
Architecture and development of Server Firmware and Software automation test scripts and utilities

Qualifications

This job is reserved for the person who is always passionate to putting new technology into practice in the fastest manner, exploring all possible alternatives for better solution, and pursuing constant improvement on test efficiency and coverage.

You should possess a Master of Science degree in in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or relevant technology with 10+ years of applicable industrial experience, or bachelor in aforementioned area with 12+ years of applicable industry experience. Additional qualifications include:
Solid understanding of software testing, process and methodologies;
Strong hands on experience on Firmware's such as BIOS, Microcode, ACM, SGX, Open BMC, SPS, DCPMM, PFM,
Solid validation experience; understanding of Windows/Linux OS knowledge.
Strong at analytical problem solving, code debugging and module based problem solving skills.
Recognition and/or reduction and tolerance of ambiguity
Demonstrated effectiveness in multitasking over simultaneous problem areas and/or assignments
Highly effective interactions with teams and individuals
Good team player, be able to work well with peers and seniors from various disciplines, employs good team practices
Good customer orientation and ability to interface with customers and/or stakeholders from remote sites
Demonstrated capability to work within a team environment facing fast-changing requirements and complicated stakeholders.
Good English verbal and writing skills.
Inside this Business Group
The Data Center Group (DCG) is at the heart of Intel’s transformation from a PC company to a company that runs the cloud and billions of smart, connected computing devices. The data center is the underpinning for every data-driven service, from artificial intelligence to 5G to high-performance computing, and DCG delivers the products and technologies—spanning software, processors, storage, I/O, and networking solutions—that fuel cloud, communications, enterprise, and government data centers around the world.

Legal Disclaimer:
Intel prohibits discrimination based on race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation or any other legally protected status.
It has come to our notice that some people have received fake job interview letters ostensibly issued by Intel, inviting them to attend interviews in Intel’s offices for various positions and further requiring them to deposit money to be eligible for the interviews. We wish to bring to your notice that these letters are not issued by Intel or any of its authorized representatives. Hiring at Intel is based purely on merit and Intel does not ask or require candidates to deposit any money. We would urge people interested in working for Intel, to apply directly at www.jobs.intel.com and not fall prey to unscrupulous elements.

Title: Global Category Procurement Manager
Description:
Global Category Procurement Manager
Job Description
Main Accountabilities
A. IT Procurement
Manage end-to-end sourcing activities (e.g. quotations, tender, proprietary, waivers etc) of IT products and services (including but not limited to software, hardware, consultancy services, licensing etc) for K-C i.e. managing commercial process of vendor bids, review recommendation papers etc.
Negotiate (in alignment with K-C policies) with external parties for better terms and cost savings.
Build strong relationships with internal customers and vendors/suppliers.
Provide advice and consultation for interpretation of policies/procedures.
Conduct training for development of procurement competency across the department; facilitate platform for sharing of knowledge for continuous learning and development of procurement expertise
Partnership with a central team of data analytics in driving innovative IT projects including but not limited to the use of Artificial Intelligent, Machine Learning, Robotic Process Automation etc.
Identify and innovate with implementation of process improvement opportunities
B. IT Contract Management
Focal point for IT contract negotiations and document project discussions into contractual form (where necessary) for execution.
Standardizing contractual agreements with related internal departments and external vendors, manage and maintain contract database (i.e. ETQ) for signed contracts/ addendums/ schedules (includes tracking of contract expiry, renewals etc)
Ensure compliance to K-C policies/procedures in relation to contractual matters and escalate to senior management where terms fall outside of K-C’s policies
Conduct yearly reviews on contractual terms and conditions with internal legal department
C. IT Vendor Management
Evaluate potential suppliers using developed and agreed criteria to negotiate contractual relationships to meet the expectations and requirements of the K-C
Partner with the Vendor Management Office (VMO) to monitor and report on the performance of selected vendors to ensure delivery in line with contractual obligations and performance metrics
Engage with the VMO to assess strategic vendor needs and manage overall strategic vendor relationships.
Monitor and report on the performance of selected vendors to ensure delivery in line with contractual obligations and performance metrics
Jointly with the Delivery/Innovation teams in IT, develop new “Digital Suppliers: including startups and appropriate methods if working with them in an agile manner.
D. Single Point of Contact for Procurement needs of GDTC
While the primary expertise and focus is on core IT procurement requirements, this role will be the single point of contact on all procurement needs of GDTC. The smaller spends in other categories will need to be synergised with those categories in procurement – but ensure it is done in an agile manner as required for a Global Centre that is rapidly scaling up
E. Work with regional and Global category leaders to ensure programs/strategies are aligned with priorities and expectations of delivering on cost, quality and service as well as addressing the areas of risk assessment and mitigation. The role requires developing strong and influential relationship with internal stakeholders in country, Region and Global teams. The role will be part of Extended Leadership of the Global IT Center.
ESSENTIAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:
Lead development of procurement strategies and support global strategies.
Lead to execute regional/ global strategy with best practices- market intelligence, analytic and communication with key internal stakeholders.
Lead contract development and its implementation/ compliance
Manage relationship with key suppliers and key K-C internal stakeholders and establish regular communication channels to create best value sourcing.
Set and drive Global IT Center saving target for responsible spends.
Ensure the Global IT Center has a continuous improvement plan to improve P2P metrics year on year. Role model appropriate behaviours and ensure that K-C policies and procedures and followed throughout procurement process. Act as a point of reference for any procurement related ethics and compliance matters. For these, drive best practices utilizing digital procurement tools as such K-C Marketplace, Global Spending Analysis, FORCE and ETQ.
GENERAL EXPECTATIONS AND ACOUNTABILITIES
Manage self in accordance with the expected One K-C Behaviors.
Lead and/or oversee tasks such as recruiting, onboarding, training, talent management etc. Provide feedback, coaching and direction to team leaders and team members.
Builds capability in self by maintaining and demonstrating a high degree of knowledge and skill in quality management systems, processes and regulations.
Establishes and maintains collaborative relationships while driving solutions to meet business needs. Develops and maintains a strong spirit of partnership.
Conduct all communications and transactions with the utmost integrity, consistent with the K-C Code of Conduct. Communicate fully with Senior Leaders, Peers, etc. with matters that are appropriate.
H. Work Conditions
10-15% overseas travel
Knowledge, Skills and Experience
Bachelor’s degree, ideally science or engineering related. Masters degree / MBA preferred.
12 plus years of work experience in Procurement with experience of IT Procurement.
Demonstrated management experiences within a complex, matrixed, International business organization.
Strong leadership skills are prerequisite. This role needs an individual willing to find opportunities where never intervene as well as maintain recurring sourcing works for IT Centre with proper procurement/ corporate compliance, especially ability to lead and influence internal stakeholders and supplier relationship management.
Effective Communication - the candidate must have excellent written and verbal communication skills and be highly confident enough to engage in discussions with senior leadership.
Demonstrate knowledge in contracts and commercial law.
Confident in giving presentations and commercial negotiation
Good business judgment, analytical and communication skills (written & verbal)
Possess critical thinking and has conceptual abilities to understand issues and resolve them
Both independent & team player with ability to work with people from all corporate levels
Able to multi-task and respond quickly and effectively to the challenges faced in a fast-paced environment, work well under pressure, able to plan and prioritize workload
Good with numbers and meticulous.
Global VISA and Relocation Specifications:
Primary Location
IT Centre Bangalore GDTC
Additional Locations

Employee

Title: Sr Customer Support Engineer
Description:
Aspect employs a team of passionate individuals who are changing the face of customer engagement. Over our 40-year history we have empowered employees by creating an inspired community that values customer obsession, unlocked communications and relentless innovation. Our ability to think big has enabled us to continually evolve and lead the market, and to stay on the forefront with exciting technologies including cloud, mobile and artificial intelligence.
Job Description
GENERAL SCOPE & SUMMARY
Provide remote technical and application problem resolution and escalation assistance related to Aspect products. Diagnose, troubleshoot, repair and debug complex computer systems and software. Respond to situations where end users have failed to isolate or resolve problems in malfunctioning equipment or software.
PRIMARY ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES
Gain and maintain knowledge of assigned customers' technical and business environment, including key customer contacts and account management team.
Provide in-depth problem determination and verification, including (but not limited to) complex Root Cause Analysis reports. Engage with Engineering teams to diagnose product defects. Construct and document clear and concise Technical Plans of Action for customers and front line support.
Provide effective and consistent communication to management, peers and account team in support of customer. Articulate the technical operations and functioning characteristics of assigned products and third party technologies.
Provide leadership on high profile account issues. Drive global support escalations when necessary.
Support, coach and mentor front line support.
Possess an in-depth level of Aspect product knowledge within a specific area of technology focus and demonstrate proven ability to manage complex customer issues and escalations. Work on complex issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors. Internal and external contacts often pertain to company plans and objectives.
Qualifications
SPECIALIZED KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS
Demonstrated competency in supporting main Aspect products and strategy.
Demonstrated competency related to PCs, Networks, OS platforms, databases, telephony, software applications, third party trouble identification, and ACDs.
Demonstrated ability to learn complex software tools quickly and explain those concepts to others (peers and customers).
Excellent customer service and teamwork skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Professional demeanor and high level of business acumen to maintain and enhance customer relationships. Strong ability to influence.
Ability to apply advanced principles, theories, and concepts and contribute to the development of innovative principles and ideas. Acts independently to determine methods and procedures on new assignments and may provide guidance to lower level personnel.
Capability to work on extremely complex problems where analysis of situations or data requires an evaluation of intangible variables. Ability to provide solutions that are highly creative and to exercise independent judgment in developing methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for obtaining results.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
10+ years relevant work experience supporting customers in a technical environment preferred OR commensurate college-level coursework, or a combination of both. Specialist knowledge and experience in supporting one Aspect product and at least one other product family.
Some travel, after-hours, or on-call work may be required.
Shift flexibility including weekends.
Ability to pass a background check may also be required.
Technical Certifications and second or third languages a plus but not required
Aspect is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer with a strong commitment to diversity. In that spirit, we are particularly interested in receiving applications from a broad spectrum of people, including women, minorities, individuals with disabilities, veterans or any other legally protected group.

Title: Quality Architect
Description:
At Telstra, we have a clear purpose: to build a connected future so everyone can thrive. We believe it’s people who give purpose to our technology. So we are committed to staying close to our customers and providing them the best experience. And delivering the best technology.
This is where YOU come in, by playing your part in helping our customers connect: faster, better and smarter.
Who we are?
Telstra is Australia's leading telecommunications and technology company with a rich heritage that’s been built over 100 years. From our humble beginnings in the Postmaster General’s Office to the global business we are today our people have been at the forefront of technology innovation. More recently, we have the largest Internet of Things network in Australia and are leading the way in 5G. And this is just the beginning of what we’re hoping to achieve together.
We offer a full range of services and compete in all telecommunications markets throughout Australia and are the most well-known brand in technology and communications industry.
We have operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’ve opened an Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore, and have a presence in Pune and Hyderabad. In India, we’ve set out to build a platform for innovative delivery and engagement that will strengthen our position as an industry leader. We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
About the role:
Under the overall direction of the QE, Tools & Practices COE, the Quality Engineering Chapters have the responsibility of setting and executing the testing strategy for IT. This involves implementing best practice tooling, planning and execution across IT and other parts of the business.
To be successful in the role, you’ll.
General
Plan and execute quantitative and qualitative research and analysis that generates insight to drive improvement in Information Technology (IT) testing
Help develop innovative fact-based and achievable IT strategies and operating models to enable delivery of business strategies
Manage IT transformation and change programs with an understanding of the implications the new strategy can have on the day-to-day cross-functional operations of a business
Seeks out partnership opportunities with external vendors and organisations including the coordination with technology and operations professionals to develop and introduce new testing strategies into a rapidly evolving marketplace. Once goals have been defined, the Product owner for strategy and governance inspires and influences those across the team to achieve them
Develop trust-based relationships with IT and business managers by utilising experience and networking skills to navigate the complexity of the Telstra organisation.
Design and deliver well-structured, high impact communications
Engage with multiple vendors both internal and external to Telstra to provide the best testing solutions
Governance
Consistently apply and improve Telstra operating systems, methodologies, policies and procedures.
Consistently apply and improve Telstra agreed architectural practice standards
Consistently apply and improve Telstra Design, Build and Test strategies to ensure positive customer and stakeholder experience
Building Relationships
Establish and maintain effective working relationships with peer groups and key internal stakeholders.
Manage key external stakeholders, including clients and third parties, relevant to the achievement of business objectives.
Planning/Scheduling
Plan and prioritise own workload to achieve deliverables in required time frames.
People Management
Contribute to the effectiveness of the team through positive and productive personal behaviours.
Provide advice and demonstrate initiative in areas of functional expertise, where appropriate.
Encourage the sharing and solicitation of information between work streams, creating opportunities for information transfer across the team
Self-Management
Promote and live Telstra values, displaying high standards of personal and professional integrity in all business dealings.
Develop own capability for current and future roles
Qualification –
Minimum 8+ years in Performance Test Architecture across the full SDLC in Telco BSS/OSS environments, especially in Performance Testing, Accessibility, Business Continuity, Security & Operational testing area.
Driving definition to delivery of non-functional requirements for large programs
Assist with developing strategy to manage Non-Functional testing for large programs
In depth software quality assurance experience including proven management, supervisory, or leadership experience
Experience working within a matrix-style structure with international teams on-shore and off-shore.
Experience with Tools (Load Runner, DynaTrace, Splunk, JIRA, HP Quality Centre).
Deliver a Test Strategy/Plans for each non-functional testing effort
Telco experience will be preferred.
Essential
8+ years of working with LoadRunner, JMeter etc. performance testing large scale commercial multi-tier applications
3+ years’ experience in Telco domain with Microservices, Salesforce, SAAS & PAAS applications
2+ years of experience working with OEM, AWR, New Relic, Dynatrace, AppDynamics and Splunk
2+ years of experience working with iTKO LISA implementing interface stubs for performance testing frameworks.
4+ years of experience working with scripting languages, such as PL SQL, Python, JavaScript, Ruby, Perl, Shell
2+ years of working with in Agile Scale programs with knowledge of CI/CD practise for non-functional testing
Ability to drive shift left testing approach and enable feature teams to be self-sufficient
Broad experience with multiple middleware and data store technologies
Broad experience working with message queues, databases, (relational & non-relational), caching technologies and stream processing
Comprehensive knowledge of Linux operating system, especially process and system monitoring and performance analysis and capacity planning
Strong performance analytical skills
Desirable
In-depth experience with AWS, Azure DevOps, J2EE, HTTP servers (Apache HTTPD, Tomcat, JBoss),
Experience with tuning and analysis activities.
Experience with database query optimization and performance analysis of databases
Familiarity with JMS and MQ
Familiarity with measurement and analysis tools, such as New Relic, DynaTrace or Splunk
What can we offer you?
Dynamic, innovative and knowledgeable, our people are the brains behind amazing achievements such as keeping on top of the latest technology or masterminding the store of the future. And because they share the same vision, they take the time to pass on their knowledge, mentor you, and guide you in your career path.

Here you’ll have the opportunity to work with some of the best minds in the industry, people who are passionate about Telstra and technology, and who work together to achieve great things.
Not only will you be rewarded with a competitive salary package, but there are a range of lifestyle products and services that you can access, including options to purchase additional leave, volunteer leave and the list goes on.
Sounds like you?
A career with us will give you a platform to shape tomorrow through technology. For you, that means helping us to push the boundaries of what’s possible today, and in the future. It also gives you the opportunity to empower millions helping businesses grow, evolve and reach their potential.

At Telstra, you can thrive, your way. We foster new ideas, we embrace different ways of working and thinking, and we believe an inclusive and diverse team will lead us to innovate for the future.

We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit our Telstra Careers Website: http://tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Senior Technical Writer
Description:
Company Overview / PrÃ©sentation de lâentreprise::
Nuance is the pioneer and leader in conversational artificial intelligence (AI) innovations that bring intelligence to everyday work and life. We deliver solutions that understand, analyze, and respond to people, amplifying human intelligence to increase productivity and improve security. With decades of both domain and AI expertise, we work with thousands of organizations across a wide range of industries.

Join our team! At Nuance, we are constantly reinventing how people connect with technology and with each other. Our AI-powered solutions empower organizations to transform “business as usual.” For decades, the world’s leading financial, healthcare, telecommunications, retailers, and government organizations have trusted Nuance to bring them award-winning solutions that deliver more meaningful outcomes and empower a smarter, more connected world. From clinical speech recognition technologies that free physicians to spend more time caring for patients to real-time intelligence that powers billions of customer interactions, we’re deeply committed to helping organizations push the boundaries of what’s possible.
Job Summary / Sommaire du poste: :
Position Summary:
Nuance is looking for an energetic, experienced senior technical writer to join our Enterprise R&D technical publications team. You will join a team of technical writers working across our global development organizations where you will agily develop and deliver accurate, high-impact technical content. Your content will help our customers be successful designing, developing, deploying, and tuning conversational AI applications including call center and mobile/web applications. Our users range from intelligent engineers and scientists to crafty application developers, business users, and call agents. Our products range from sophisticated programming libraries to advanced AI-based engines that support significant new product development efforts that make it easier for customers to build clever speech and language AI applications. If you’re a senior technical writer who is excited about helping to build a world-class user experience as part of our dynamic technical publications team, we want to talk to you!

Principal Duties and Responsibilities
Experience working hands-on developing highly technical documentation for a variety of audiences including designers, developers, business analysts, system administrators, and user-friendly documentation for less technical business users.
Contributing member of the team that produces documentation for Enterprise products including dialog development tooling and SDKs
Ability to work productively in a geographically distributed environment.
Familiar with modern programming languages, e.g., Java, C++, C#, python, etc.
Experience with MadCap Flare, Slate, or other MarkDown authoring environments.
Experience with GitLab source control and online documentation building and publishing workflows
Enjoy using tools like Camtasia and Snagit, looking for opportunities to enhance content through use of web-based media where appropriate
Ability to work in an agile development environment managing documentation projects while working directly with technical and marketing team members to identify requirements and schedules, and provide input on product design and usability.
A self-directed, fast learner that thrives working in a dynamic, startup-like culture.
Proactively seek opportunities to contribute to overall product success by continually analyzing content effectiveness and delivering targeted improvements
Perform tasks related to securing and keeping the products, tools, and processes that you are responsible for securing
Knowledge, Skills and Qualifications:

Education: Bachelor’s degree or higher in a Technical Communications, Library Sciences, English, or equivalent experience

Minimum Years of Work Experience: 5+ years of experience in a dynamic software development environment

Required Skills:
Familiar with modern programming languages, e.g., Java, C++, C#, python, etc.
Experience with MadCap Flare, Slate, or other MarkDown authoring environments.
Experience with GitLab source control and online documentation building and publishing workflows
Enjoy using tools like Camtasia and Snagit, looking for opportunities to enhance content through use of web-based media where appropriate
Ability to work in an agile development environment managing documentation projects while working directly with technical and marketing team members to identify requirements and schedules, and provide input on product design and usability.
A self-directed, fast learner that thrives working in a dynamic, startup-like culture.
Proactively seek opportunities to contribute to overall product success by continually analyzing content effectiveness and delivering targeted improvements
Perform tasks related to securing and keeping the products, tools, and processes that you are responsible for securing
Experience authoring highly technical documentation for developers and system administrators
Familiar with at least one modern programming paradigm (for example, REST or WebSockets)
Experience with online publishing tools and workflows; experience with markdown-based authoring and/or Flare a plus
Ability to manage documentation projects and work directly with cross-functional team members on requirements, plans, and deliverables
Experience with Agile development processes
Comfortable in a fast-paced, geographically-distributed work environment
Additional Information / Informations additionnelles::
Nuance offers a compelling and rewarding work environment. We offer market competitive salaries, bonus, equity, benefits, meaningful growth and development opportunities and a casual yet technically challenging work environment. Join our dynamic, entrepreneurial team and become part of our continuing success.

Title: Senior Quality Specialist/OPA5/Selenium/Jenkins/Automation
Description:
Requisition ID: 242501
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time

COMPANY DESCRIPTION

SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
Senior Quality Specialist

ABOUT SAP
As you know, SAP’s vision is to help the world run better and improve people’s lives. As the cloud company powered by SAP HANA®, SAP is a market leader in enterprise application software, helping companies of all sizes and industries Run Simple. We empower people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. SAP applications and services enable our customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably.
At SAP, we believe in the power of collaboration and empower our employees to perform at their best in an environment that encourages free and open expression of ideas. Here, you work alongside creative thinkers who share your interests, while turning big ideas into reality for our customers. With innovative job training, mentors to help you grow, and the flexibility to balance your work and personal life, you will be able to build a successful career. It’s no wonder that some of the sharpest minds across the world are working for a company that is consistently recognized as a global top employer.

PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES
The Global Design Team is an interdisciplinary team of Designers, Architects, Developers and Product Owners who closely work with customers and internal development organizations to provide scalable technologies that enable SAP, partners, and customers to build innovative solutions and meet the market expectations for their end-users. We create and implement new design concepts, enable scaling of FIORI design through design integrated development infrastructure and roll-out best practice for the whole company.

SAP CoPilot is SAP’s entry into the post-app era. Following on the trends of Apple Siri, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, and Microsoft Cortana, this add-on app for SAP Fiori 2.0 will use artificial intelligence and machine learning to assist users in their daily work, understand the users’ behavior and give hints to increase their productivity. CoPilot is a digital intelligent assistant for enterprise users that communicates with you in natural language. It is an app that automates mundane tasks, facilitates deep contextual collaboration, learns from data to anticipate events and recommend actions, making the enterprise users more efficient and effective at work.
Further details - https://experience.sap.com/news/talk-with-sap-copilot-the-digital-assistant-for-enterprise/

SAP is planning to evolve SAP CoPilot to become the de facto Integration Hub for team collaboration platforms (like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Facebook Workplace) and Google G Suite & Microsoft Office 365. Team collaboration platforms are supposed to revolutionize the way how teams will collaborate with each other in the future.
To facilitate the transformation of CoPilot into SAP’s Integration Hub for external service offerings, we are searching for a suitable Quality Engineer to support our local development team in Bangalore.

As a member of the Global Design team, you would help us ensure the quality of Fiori Building Blocks and CoPilot topics by performing functional and non-functional testing.
EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS
As part of the Global Design team you will:
Be part of the SAP Global Design team located in SAP Labs India, Bangalore
Have a basic knowledge of JavaScript and understanding of customer needs. Experience in working on BCP incidents.
Analyze the issues created by stakeholder/customers and come up with appropriate actions to reduce such tickets
The first point of contact for incidents raised on FE, analyze the issues and dispatch as required.
Should be able to support the framework and product we are working by participating in consulting hours, resolving issues for internal as well as external customers
Author, review and execute functional and nonfunctional test cases for new features developed.
Responsible for developing automation test scripts, executing test plans and scripts to verify that new or modified software programs function according to business requirements.
Knowledge of test automation tools (START, OPA5, Selenium).Knowledge of OPA5 is an added advantage.
Configuring and scheduling test automation within a Continuous Integration (CI) environment.
Test result analysis, reporting, and follow-up on all quality-related activities. Raise defects and track them till closure.
Work with PO and Scrum team to align expectations on schedules and effort and ensure good quality of delivery.
Be a subject matter expert in the team in terms of Product and quality assurance and test related processes, methods and tools.
Hands-on experience with SDLC tools (Jenkins, Git, Automated Testing Frameworks)
Have worked in an Agile environment / Scrum team
Perform traceability checks in Backlog Management System (JIRA) and GTP.

EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Bachelor or Master degree in Engineering with good academics background.
Good business/functional inclination and ability to quickly grasp functional topics
Excellent interpersonal skills, communication skills with the ability to explain complex information in a clear and precise manner
